reviews.name: Hot Stuffies Body Warmers, 40 Pieces
reviews.reviewText: Stays warm for over 18 hours and helps with aches and pains.
reviews.title: Hot stiffies body warmers

reviews.name: Hot Stuffies Body Warmers, 40 Pieces
reviews.reviewText: I have a job working outside, and my hands get cold(even with ski gloves) when the temperature gets into the lower 30's. I bought these online, and I put them in my ski gloves. My hands stay much warmer now. These don't get quite as hot as the Hot Hands brand, but they do the job. They are also a more reasonable price as well. With this pack, I should have enough to last me until this spring.
reviews.title: Body Warmers

reviews.name: Hot Stuffies Body Warmers, 40 Pieces
reviews.reviewText: Stayed hot for 12 hours. Great item, Can be used year round. Will buy again.
reviews.title: Hot Bodies
